DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study stereotactic radiotherapy with a dose of 40 Gy in 4 fractions over 2 weeks with concomitant 40 mg/m2 of irinotecan (1st and 3rd irradiation session).

The largest diameter of the metastasis will < ou = 6cm for the liver, < or = 6 cm for the lung. If multiple metastases, the sum of their maximum diameter is 6cm < ou = the liver, < ou = 6 cm for the lung.
